DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Lorazepam , diphenhydramine hydrochloride , haloperidol gel , absorbed skin , may effective treatment nausea vomiting.PURPOSE : This clinical trial study lorazepam , diphenhydramine hydrochloride , haloperidol gel healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Lorazepam , Diphenhydramine Hydrochloride , Haloperidol Gel Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . To study absorption three component topical ABH gel 10 healthy volunteer , determine adverse effect . OUTLINE : Patients apply lorazepam , diphenhydramine hydrochloride , haloperidol gel topically 2 minute . After completion study treatment , patient follow 5 hour .
DOC.criteria: Completed medical screening questionnaire English speaking No allergy drug Able complete form If woman childbearing age , agree use contraception History substance abuse , psychiatric disorder , acquire brain injury , possibility pregnancy ( use birth control , child bearing age ) Use medication would contraindicate benzodiazepine administration Pregnant nursing
